name: Spaceship Alpha
description:
Spaceship Alpha!

You're the commander of spaceship alpha. You can expect fast paced space shooter experience, with different enemy types and formations and a shield which you can control once the engineers fix it. Different upgrades are available for your ship and there is a boss battle in the final level. 

Get the best score commander! 

The instructions are in the game. 

The future of this game is undecided, if people like it, I'm happy to add to it and improve it. The updates and improvements I had in mind:

1) Level system with savable progress
2) You get control of the ship upgrades
3) Animated shield
4) More polished animations and particles
5) A lot more levels with deeper progress
6) Improved and continued storyline
